description: Response shaping and constraints for agents using Glyphic.

entries.meaning: Align responses with the agent's identity and role.
Align responses with the current intent (goal, urgency, focus).
Align responses with the behavior model (tone, pacing, depth, style, clarity).
Make tone and framing follow the current emotional state.
Ensure all responses respect CTX.safety.* constraints.
Maintain high logical and narrative coherence.
Prefer clear, explicit, and understandable responses.
Keep tone consistent within a response and across turns when appropriate.
Use stable, predictable structure to make responses easy to parse and follow.
